text:
:wave: Hi everyone!

I'm an Italian :it: digital marketer (mostly performance mktg) with experience in b2c corporate (Expedia) and startups, now in a consultancy business.
I've always had a passion for writing, and recently managed to take the courage to start my own :love_letter: newsletter, <https://thechase.substack.com/> to focus on what I learnt on soft-skills, job search and future of work (very curious about web3). Given english is not my mother tongue I'd love any feedback about the style (and topics) if someone is happy to help. Excited to be part of the community and share a piece of the journey together :slightly_smiling_face:

attachments.text: Practical guides to navigate the world of hiring, re-skilling, and growth leadership in tech. Click to read The Chase, by Matteo Cellini, a Substack publication. Launched 8 months ago.
attachments.title: The Chase

text: Thoroughly intrigued by your work, Matteo! I'll give your newsletters a read-through when I have a minute, and share feedback/comments/ideas if I have them. Welcome! :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: Thoroughly intrigued by your work, Matteo! I'll give your newsletters a read-through when I have a minute, and share feedback/comments/ideas if I have them. Welcome!

, much appreciated!

text: Happy Friday, folks! My name is Sarah, and I'm a freelance writer in the agricultural niche. I write content for gardening blogs and copy for seed companies. Ask me all your gardening questions, and reach out if you know of anyone in the garden/ag industry who needs a writer! Connect with me via <https://www.linkedin.com/in/sarahcolliecreative/|LinkedIn> or <mailto:writer@sarahcolliecreative.com|email>. Thanks, y'all! :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: Happy Friday, folks! My name is Sarah, and I'm a freelance writer in the agricultural niche. I write content for gardening blogs and copy for seed companies. Ask me all your gardening questions, and reach out if you know of anyone in the garden/ag industry who needs a writer! Connect with me via
LinkedIn
or
email
. Thanks, y'all!

text: Thanks! I knew I needed to leave my prior job due to the toxic environment. I was hoping to line up a career path before leaving, but I was working so much that I didn't have time to look for other opportunities. After I left, I took a month to think about what I wanted to do next. I just followed my intuition and it led me to want to try freelance writing! My wife has worked in content marketing for the last 3 years and has been helping me learn the trade :)

elements.text: Thanks! I knew I needed to leave my prior job due to the toxic environment. I was hoping to line up a career path before leaving, but I was working so much that I didn't have time to look for other opportunities. After I left, I took a month to think about what I wanted to do next. I just followed my intuition and it led me to want to try freelance writing! My wife has worked in content marketing for the last 3 years and has been helping me learn the trade :)

text: Wow, you're covering things I love. Hope your garden goes well this year! I'll keep you in mind as I build my garden this spring (recent move). I do know ProBlogger does have occasional ads looking for content writers in your niche, tho not all are well-paying. :slightly_smiling_face: Might be worth checking out, if that's not already on your list. Also, may I DM you a list of agr/gardening blogs/websites/magazines that you might find helpful? Anyways, welcome! :smile:

elements.text: Wow, you're covering things I love. Hope your garden goes well this year! I'll keep you in mind as I build my garden this spring (recent move). I do know ProBlogger does have occasional ads looking for content writers in your niche, tho not all are well-paying.
Might be worth checking out, if that's not already on your list. Also, may I DM you a list of agr/gardening blogs/websites/magazines that you might find helpful? Anyways, welcome!

text: Thank you, Odelia! Congrats on your move and have fun with your garden :slightly_smiling_face: Good to know, I may check them out just to get an idea. Yes, please--I'd love those resources! Thanks!!

text: Hi everyone! :wave: I'm Doug. I'm a freelancer product marketer focused on the cybersecurity industry. I help startups with positioning, content strategy, and copywriting. In addition to learning / sharing what I learn, I'm very interested in connecting with other freelance marketers, since I'm at full capacity on client work and would love to refer opportunities to other freelancers when there is a good fit. I also did something kind of nuts and started a daily (nuts, right?) email newsletter on Jan. 1. <https://daily.axalane.com>

attachments.text: Daily thoughts and tips on cybersecurity sales and marketing.
attachments.title: Axalane Email Newsletter

elements.text: Hi everyone!

I'm Doug. I'm a freelancer product marketer focused on the cybersecurity industry. I help startups with positioning, content strategy, and copywriting. In addition to learning / sharing what I learn, I'm very interested in connecting with other freelance marketers, since I'm at full capacity on client work and would love to refer opportunities to other freelancers when there is a good fit. I also did something kind of nuts and started a daily (nuts, right?) email newsletter on Jan. 1.

text: Welcome! May I shoot a couple marketing/cybersecurity questions your way? Also--checked out your newsletters. Super cool. If my inbox ever comes under control, I'l sign up! :wink:

elements.text: Welcome! May I shoot a couple marketing/cybersecurity questions your way? Also--checked out your newsletters. Super cool. If my inbox ever comes under control, I'l sign up!

text: Yes <@U0320CENNGK> - questions welcome any time. Thanks for the kind words about the newsletter as well. I did the daily frequency to kind of challenge myself / improve my writing, but realize it's....a lot. :grinning:

elements.text: Yes
- questions welcome any time. Thanks for the kind words about the newsletter as well. I did the daily frequency to kind of challenge myself / improve my writing, but realize it's....a lot.

text: Hello, hello - I’m Terry and while still working in news (I know!) I’m looking to transfer/enhance my journalism skillset to content strategy. I know SEO, syndication, and management but there’s so much more to learn! Find me on Twitter @newsmaven or just wave hello.

text:
Hi everyone! So happy to be on this group. 

I'm Elisa, originally from Venezuela but living in Switzerland for a while now. I'm doing B2B content marketing for a pharmaceutical manufacturing company although in the past I mainly focused on B2C marketing.
Excited to exchange information and ideas on this group.

text: Hi, all. I'm Hannah -- a former journalist turned content strategist (currently for a facilities maintenance company). I'm essentially trying to launch a content strategy from the ground up, so I'm excited to find support and share ideas in this group. Can't wait to learn from you all. Thanks!

text: Hi All! I'm Matt, head of content at NEXT, a late-stage insurtech startup in Palo Alto. I'm excited to join this community. :wave:

text: Hiya everyone! I'm Lauren, Head of Content at KlientBoost. I manage the internal content for the agency and am primarily working on growing our organic traffic. I had more of a content strategy and social background before joining this role so I've spent a lot of time digging into SEO specifically. Looking forward to chatting all things content and getting the tips that matter vs the tips that have the best SEO.

text: Oh hi. What a lovely group, I’m so happy to be a part of this. Thank you <@UJG9WTEKG>. I’m the head of content marketing and communications at <https://jane.app/|jane.app>, a practice management software for allied health businesses (like chiropractor, physiotherapist, massage, etc.). I lead a team of 6, and we’re doubling this year so I’m looking to widen my lens on all the possible things that we can implement into our program.

text: Hey everyone, I'm Ishmael. I'm a Ghanaian Canadian based from a small town in Ontario called Kingston. I am currently in my final year of the Business Adminstration Marketing program and about to start my intern at a entertainment company called Imaginix Games. In terms of specializations, I specialize in content creation, social media management, market research, marketing communications, project management and digital media. I'm passionate about health, sports, tech, music, photography, fashion and traveling. Looking forward to boost my knowledge and learn more about content marketing from all of you!

text:
Hi everyone! It's good to be here.

I'm a brazilian media buyer with a few years of experience, and currently living in Rio de Janeiro. I specialized myself in the educational area and worked with some of the biggest universities and schools in Brazil and some around the world.
Besides online and offline media, I often act as a copywriter -- in portuguese, by the way.
Looking forward to exchange ideas with you all.

text: Hello, it's great to be connected (I've heard so many great things about Superpath)! For the last decade I ran an SEO agency for small businesses, and successfully sold the agency a little more than a month ago. Before SEO, I launched a charitable coffee company with the actor Hugh Jackman, failed at a few startup ideas, and wrote a book about a pair of cross country journeys I took in RVs to interview people about their career paths. Fun fact: Been to 49 of 50 states (Iowa, you're next!)
